data.text: @Johnee_Dee Stay safe. Speedy recovery to your son.

@B52Malmet I'm in Brooklyn, where there are low covid transmission rates, and was very surprised my son got covid. He's feeling it like a flu, but i am keeping the mask on inside all public spaces until I feel it is safe. So yes,  good on you to test and stay safe.

@B52Malmet An immunocompromised friend wanted me to come visit recently. I’m also immunocompromised, and I stay at home, but my kids work in public. I went ahead and tested, turned out being positive and canceled. I came down with all the symptoms the day after I was supposed to go visit.
@B52Malmet I just recieved my free tests from the government last week 🤞🇺🇸🤞
@B52Malmet Traveling through Portugal this week. It is so nice to find a country that cares about its people and has supported them through this “HEALTH CRISIS”. No political drama here.
@B52Malmet I finally got my 4. Last week.
@B52Malmet I m just going to keep wearing a mask.
